name: Ele-Man
description:
THE Super Powerful Ele-Man has to save the villagers, with his super mega elemental powers.

Controls

- Use the arrow keys to move
-Tab or "C" to change power
-Mouse to interact with objects

Installation
Unzip the Ele-Man folder and run GameJam 2020

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EL Superpoderoso Ele-Man tiene que salvar a los aldeanos, con sus supermega poderes elementales.

Controles

- Utiliza Las flechas para moverte
-Tab o "C" para cambiar poder
-Mouse para interactuar con los objetos

Instalación
Descomprimela carpeta Ele-Man y ejecuta GameJam 2020
